verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that one <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> is <S%H2470>sick:<s%> and he <S%H3947>took<s%> with him his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

And one <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> to you: and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> himself, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> on the <S%H4296>bed.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to me at <S%H3870>Luz<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> me,

And <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will make you <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> you, and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> of you a <S%H6951>multitude<s%> of <S%H5971>people;<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H272>possession.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> your <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> which were <S%H3205>born<s%> to you in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5704>before<s%> I <S%H935>came<s%> to you into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> are mine; as <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> they shall be mine.

And your <S%H4138>issue,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3205>beget<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, shall be yours, and shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H251>brothers<s%> in their <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

And as for me, when I <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H6307>Padan,<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> by me in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H5750>when<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> there was but a <S%H3530>little<s%> <S%H776>way<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath:<s%> and I <S%H6912>buried<s%> her <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H672>Ephrath;<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> is <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>beheld<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> are <S%H428>these?<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> They are my <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> me in <S%H2088>this<s%> place. And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>Bring<s%> them, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, to me, and I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> them.

Now the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H3513>dim<s%> for <S%H2207>age,<s%> so that he <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H7200>see.<s%> And he <S%H5066>brought<s%> them <S%H5066>near<s%> to him; and he <S%H5401>kissed<s%> them, and <S%H2263>embraced<s%> them.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> I had not <S%H6419>thought<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H6440>face:<s%> and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7200>showed<s%> me <S%H1571>also<s%> your <S%H2233>seed.<s%>
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out from <S%H5973>between<s%> his <S%H1290>knees,<s%> and he <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> them <S%H8147>both,<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> in his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> toward <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand,<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in his <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand<s%> toward <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and <S%H5066>brought<s%> them <S%H5066>near<s%> to him.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and <S%H7896>laid<s%> it on <S%H669>Ephraim's<s%> <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> was the <S%H6810>younger,<s%> and his <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand<s%> on <S%H4519>Manasseh's<s%> <S%H7218>head,<s%> guiding his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H7919>wittingly;<s%> for <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> was the <S%H1060>firstborn.<s%>

And he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> my <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> did <S%H1980>walk,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> which <S%H7462>fed<s%> me all my life <S%H5750>long<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%>

The <S%H4397>Angel<s%> which <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> me from <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H5288>lads;<s%> and let my <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H7121>named<s%> on them, and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac;<s%> and let them <S%H1711>grow<s%> into a <S%H7230>multitude<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And when <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7896>laid<s%> his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> it <S%H7489>displeased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> him: and he <S%H8551>held<s%> up his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> to <S%H5493>remove<s%> it from <S%H669>Ephraim's<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> to <S%H4519>Manasseh's<s%> <S%H7218>head.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> Not <S%H3651>so,<s%> my <S%H1>father:<s%> for <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1060>firstborn;<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> on his <S%H7218>head.<s%>

And his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3985>refused,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> it, my <S%H1121>son,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> it: he <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H5971>people,<s%> and he <S%H1571>also<s%> shall be <S%H1431>great:<s%> but <S%H199>truly<s%> his <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> shall be <S%H1431>greater<s%> than he, and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H4393>multitude<s%> of <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

And he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> In you shall <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1288>bless,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> you as <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and as <S%H4519>Manasseh:<s%> and he <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H4191>die:<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> shall be with you, and <S%H7725>bring<s%> you <S%H7725>again<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Moreover I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to you <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7926>portion<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H3947>took<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> with my <S%H2719>sword<s%> and with my <S%H7198>bow.<s%>
